subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: An annual networking function, which was started by Virginia Commonwealth in 2004, has helped 59 former assistants get coaching jobs, including Shaka Smart at V.C.U.
snippet: An annual networking function, which was started by Virginia Commonwealth in 2004, has helped 59 former assistants get coaching jobs, including Shaka Smart at V.C.U.
